definition-set.label: System Properties
definition-set.description:
System Property Types:
  (String) - Value may be up to 6000 characters in length.
  (Boolean) - Value may be one of 'Y', 'YES', 'T', 'TRUE', 'N', 'NO', 'F', or 'FALSE.' Values are not case sensitive.
  (Date) - Value must be formatted as MM/DD/YYYY.
  (Float) - Value must be numeric and include a decimal point and at least one numeral to the right of the decimal point, for example 123.0.
  (Integer) - Value must be numeric and cannot include a decimal point.
  Properties marked (Type - Internal Use Only) should not be changed.

definition-set.label: Enforcement Action Tracking Events
definition-set.description: Enforcement Action Tracking Events - Note: IMPACT relies on the existence of the following codes to support the date columns in the Enforcement Action List search results datagrid: 003 (NOV issued), 004 (Day Zero), 027 (Referred to AG), 020 (Final Settlement Agreement/Consent Decree signed), 023 (Check Received), 025 (NOV Closed). These events should not be set to inactive and the associated description should not be substantially changed without consulting with IMPACT developers.

definition-set.label: Enforcement Action Tracking Event Dependencies
definition-set.description: Enforcement Action Tracking Events - Note: Care should be taken when selecting the Event and Predecessor Event. The system does not prevent the following: 1) an inactive Event Type can be selected for both the Event and Predecessor Event; 2) the same Event Type can be selected for Event and Predecessor Event; 3) circular dependencies could inadvertently be created.

definition-set.label: SCC Codes
definition-set.description:
Source Classification Codes (SCC):
If the SCC ID is 'A-BC-DEF-GH', then
  L1 Desc must be 'A:level 1 description',
  L2 Desc must be 'BC:level 2 description',
  L3 Desc must be 'DEF:level 3 description' and
  L4 Desc must be 'GH:level 4 description'.

Where two SCCs have the same value down to a certain level, those SCCs must specify exactly the same descriptions for each of those matching levels.

The Admin user can change the Days value for each benchmark.

definition-set.label: Functions
definition-set.description: A function marked as fixed will be added to the timesheet report regardless of whether the user has charged any hours for the function. Note: If the value for the grouped column is set to yes, then for the non-exempt grouped report, the hours charged as overtime for the given function will be grouped along with the hours charged as non-overtime in the timesheet report.

definition-set.label: Sections
definition-set.description: If the hours entered for a particular section needs to be reported separately on the timesheet report, then set the Report Separately value to Yes for such sections. Also, if you prefer to display a different value other than the section code in the timesheet report, then specify the desired value in the Display Code column.

definition-set.label: Monthly Report Types
definition-set.description: Monthly timesheet report types that can be generated by the system
